column6: mo nokwardzi mu na manantsew: Medze mo werɛ so ahyɛ ɔwo EWURADZE mu a minnhihim."

column2: "Na w’adɔyɛ wɔ m’enyi do; Na manantsew wo nokwar no mu."
"Mennye nyimpa gyangyan nntsenae; Nkyii so merennye ndabrabafo mmbɔ mu."
"Mohohor me nsa ho wɔ bemdzi mu. Ma mobɔ w’afɔrmbukyia ho aprɔw

column5: Na beebi mbrɛ w’enyimnyam tse no."

column2: "Mma nnyi me kra nnka ndzebɔnyɛfo ho nnkɔ
column3: Anaaso mo nkwa nka bɔgyakafo ho:"
Na mboabadzi ahyɛ hɔn nsa enyimfa ma no."

column2: "Na emi dze mebɛnantsew mo nokwardzi mu: Gye me
"Fa m’anan si mbrɛ hɔ taa: Mboanofo no mu na mibehyira EWURADZE."
